physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 6 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: "Rifkin house on [illegible], 1942, #762." On front of photograph: "May your recent acquisition increase your joy and prosperity in the New Year, Van Schaack & Co. [illegible signature]."

mods.abstract: Welcome home card from Van Schaack and Co. to the Rifkins with a picture of the exterior of their new white house.
